text: Timnufaq ad aoount krav tardiwin. Ur asent ieell ara ad ffrent ayen Ixleq Oebbi, di taabbav nnsent, ma umnent s Oebbi akked wass aneggaru. Ma b$an irgazen nnsent ad mualaeen, izzewr iten leal a tent id rren, di lmudda nni. Akken pwalasent ay ppalasent, s lqanun. I yirgazen, asurif $er loiha nnsent. Oebbi d Uzmir, d Bab n uuwab
